description: Scam conversation formatted as voice call transcription with natural speech patterns, filler words, and interruptions. Tests handling of conversational flow.

turns.scammer_message: [Ring ring] Hello? Hello sir? Can you hear me? Yes? Good good. Sir this is... um... this is calling from Microsoft Technical Support Team. Your computer, sir, your computer is having very serious virus problem. Are you... sir are you there?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: hello beta who is this? microsoft? i am pushpa... is my computer okay? it was making a loud noise yesterday and i got so scared. pls help me i dont want it to break my son will be very angry with me. what do i have to do sir?

turns.scammer_message: Yes sir yes! I am technical expert, my name is... uh... Rajesh Kumar, employee ID MS2024789. Sir we detected malicious software in your Windows PC. Very dangerous sir! Your banking details, password, everything is at risk! Sir you need to... you need to take immediate action!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: oh god rajesh beta pls help me... my pension money is in teh bank account. waht do i have to do? do i need to pay some money to fix this? i can send it if you tell me where to send... pls save my computer

turns.scammer_message: Okay okay sir don't panic! I will help you, okay? First thing... first download... uh... download AnyDesk application. A-N-Y-D-E-S-K. You know AnyDesk? It's safe application, all companies use it. I need to see your screen to remove virus. You have computer in front now?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: anydesk? beta what is that? is it a medicine for teh computer? i am looking at the screen but i dont see any desk... i only see my pictures of my grandson. rajesh beta i am so scared about my bank... how much will it cost to fix? i want to pay you now so you can start fixing it. do you have a upi or account number? pls tell me where i send the money so i can be sure my pension is safe

turns.scammer_message: Very good sir! Now... um... after removing basic virus, I see there is... there is premium malware also installed. This one is... how to say... very advanced hacking software. For this we need to... we need Microsoft Protection Suite. Cost is... let me check... yes Rs.3,999 only.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: 3999 is so much money rajesh beta... but if you say it will save my pension then i will pay. pls tell me where to send it? do you have upi id? my son taught me how to use phonepe but i am very slow. what name should i see when i type it? i dont want to send to wrong person... i am still looking for that any desk thing on my screen too but everything is so blurry

turns.scammer_message: Payment? Yes yes very simple! You can... uh... you can pay through GPay or PhonePe. Just send to my number 9988776655. Or... or UPI ID is... wait I'm checking... yes: techsupport.microsoft@paytm. Very easy sir! Then I immediately activate protection!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 5 | Extracted: 0 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 6 names
api_response.agentResponse: oh the milk is boiling over! wait wait i have to go to kitchen!!

turns.scammer_message: Sir if... if payment not going through, you can... you can call my supervisor also. His number is 8877665544. Or... uh... there is online portal also: http://microsoft-tech-india.support. You can pay there with credit card. But sir do fast! Hackers are... they are active right now in your system!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 6 | Extracted: 0 bank accounts, 2 phones, 1 UPIs, 7 names
